name: Mini Breed
description:
Mini breed is a minimalist pet breeding and survival game.

Your farm is threatened by army of drone. Only army of your magical pet "Mini" can fend them off.

use WASD or Arrow keys for movement. Mini will try to follow you.

Collect 2 loves to breed more "Mini"

You can sustain 1 hit and wait for sometime to heal yourself.

Your minies don't heal so take a good care of them !

This project was made for LowRezJam 2021.

Theme: mini beast.

Thanks for playing !

Feel free to comment. 

Promise to improve the quality of my game in the future !
